title: Welcome to the Latest Edition of
The Justia Insider
message: We are celebrating our first newsletter anniversary! We are pleased to announce the first anniversary of The Justia Insider. Our newsletter has become an incredible instrument to share information and projects from all the company teams. We have also been able to highlight and acknowledge the contributions of our excellent colleagues from Mexico and the United States. As we celebrate our newsletter's first anniversary, we are delighted to report that we continue succeeding as a company with everybody's work and dedication. On behalf of our Editorial Team, we would like to thank everyone.
